text: @darrenpjones @EnvAgency @H_S_E Should we also be asking about the exposure to risk for people living nearby? Avonmouth has a lot of waste processing, as well as other toxic materials, all packed together in one small area. It's asking for widespread trouble if explosions like these continue unchecked.
